name: GamepadSerialBridge:
author: Noah Ruimveld
sentence: Bridge gamepad/controller state over Serial/UART to Arduino via callbacks.
paragraph: GamepadSerialBridge listens on a Serial/UART interface for structured controller state frames, parses them, and invokes user-defined callbacks when inputs change. It is transport-agnostic and works with any device that outputs the expected frame format (for example, an ESP32 running Bluepad).
